title: Episode 22: Stanford Prison Experiment... Part 2 (Dr. Derek Jeffreys)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: As a follow up to our previous episode on the Stanford Prison Experiment (https://soundcloud.com/rycmart/episode16), we talk with Dr. Derek Jeffreys, Philosophy and Religious Studies Professor at the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay.  Dr. Jeffreys has written several books on topics related to ethics, torture, and solitary confinement, and has extensive experience teaching in prisons and jails.

description: As a follow up to our previous episode on the Stanford Prison Experiment (https://soundcloud.com/rycmart/episode16), we talk with Dr. Derek Jeffreys, Philosophy and Religious Studies Professor at the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay.  Dr. Jeffreys has written several books on topics related to ethics, torture, and solitary confinement, and has extensive experience teaching in prisons and jails.
